entries.meaning: (informal, in the singular) Clipping of statistics. (the subject)
examples: Stats is one of her favourite subjects at school.

entries.meaning: (informal, in the plural, plural only) Clipping of statistics. (data, figures)
examples: What do the stats tell us?

entries.meaning: (role-playing games, video games slang) Attributes of a unit in a game (e.g. health, damage output)
examples: Those items he bought really boosted his stats.
